医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
COVID-19 和金属味：研究将免疫球蛋白水平与感觉障碍联系起来研究人员调查了与 COVID-19 相关的感觉缺陷是否与舌头叶状乳头区域的转录组变化有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/COVID-19-and-metalic-taste-Study-connects-immunoglobulin-levels-to-sensory-impairment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/COVID-19-and-metalic-taste-Study-connects-immunoglobulin-levels-to-sensory-impairment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=120ae5a8-4bf1-4178-a78e-d7fc1e927689 Tue, 09 Jul 2024 06:11:00 -0400 COVID-19 and metallic taste: Study connects immunoglobulin levels to sensory impairment
遗传风险较高和较低的男性之间早期前列腺癌死亡的风险有何差异？遗传风险较高与较低的男性早期前列腺癌死亡的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/What-is-the-difference-in-risk-of-early-prostate-cancer-death- Between-men-at-higher-vs-lower-遗传风险.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/What-is-the-difference-in-risk-of-early-prostate-cancer-death- Between-men-at-higher-vs-lower-遗传风险.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a25ee010-6749-4f9c-b47a-f5cd7b575ac1 Tue, 09 Jul 2024 06:05:00 -0400 What is the difference in risk of early prostate cancer death between men at higher vs lower genetic risk?
探索糖尿病患者的生活方式与抑郁症之间的联系生活方式模式和饮食对糖尿病患者抑郁症的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Exploring-the-link- Between-lifestyle-patterns-and-depression-in-diabetic-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Exploring-the-link- Between-lifestyle-patterns-and-depression-in-diabetic-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=65c27225-b6ef-463a-8ce9-ea8201ae3ab2 Tue, 09 Jul 2024 05:30:00 -0400 Exploring the link between lifestyle patterns and depression in diabetic individuals
联合利华合作伙伴关系的最新进展Aptamer Group 是新型 Optimer® 粘合剂的开发商，旨在促进生命科学行业的创新，该公司正在提供与联合利华合作伙伴关系的最新信息，为化妆品应用提供 Optimer 粘合剂。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Update-on-progress-in-Unilever-partnership.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Update-on-progress-in-Unilever-partnership.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a967cb29-0404-4e1c-93be-79bd12dd43e5 Tue, 09 Jul 2024 04:25:00 -0400 Update on progress in Unilever partnership
Newcells Biotech 任命 Emile Shaffu 为销售总监Newcells Biotech 是一家领先的药物发现合作伙伴，专门开发体外模型和定制化验服务，以改善对人体体内结果的预测，今天宣布任命 Emile Shaffu 为销售总监。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Newcells-Biotech-appoints-Emile-Shaffu-as-Director-of-Sales.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Newcells-Biotech-appoints-Emile-Shaffu-as-Director-of-Sales.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f7248c8-5f3d-47f3-90e4-b25e33fa8c58 Tue, 09 Jul 2024 04:24:00 -0400 Newcells Biotech appoints Emile Shaffu as Director of Sales
协议探索用于 siRNA 靶向递送的 Optimer 载体新的合作将利用 siRNA 评估 Aptamer 的纤维化肝脏递送载体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Agreement-to-explore-Optimer-vehicles-for-targeted-delivery-of-siRNA.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/Agreement-to-explore-Optimer-vehicles-for-targeted-delivery-of-siRNA.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5324c412-2ae8-44f6-9c26-d01154f43aca Tue, 09 Jul 2024 04:22:00 -0400 Agreement to explore Optimer vehicles for targeted delivery of siRNA
INTEGRA Biosciences 的移液器有助于农业的成功位于罗马尼亚 Fundulea 的国家农业研究与发展研究所 (NARDI) 依靠 INTEGRA Biosciences 的电子多通道移液器来简化其液体处理工作流程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/INTEGRA-Biosciencese28099-pipettes-help-to-cultivate-success-in-agriculture.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240709/INTEGRA-Biosciencese28099-pipettes-help-to-cultivate-success-in-agriculture.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=823fafbb-51a4-47a5-9d2a-5f86978d5b34 Tue, 09 Jul 2024 03:13:00 -0400 INTEGRA Biosciences’ pipettes help to cultivate success in agriculture
革命性的 3D 成像模型增强 IVF 囊胚选择今天在阿姆斯特丹举行的 ESHRE 第 40 届年会上发布的创新研究推出了一种新颖的 3D 成像模型，旨在识别与成功妊娠相关的囊胚（植入胚胎发育的早期阶段）的特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Revolutionary-3D-imaging-model-enhances-IVF-blastocyst-selection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Revolutionary-3D-imaging-model-enhances-IVF-blastocyst-selection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5984a360-e96c-4b3c-adc2-82dd45e89748 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 23:41:00 -0400 Revolutionary 3D imaging model enhances IVF blastocyst selection
研究揭示了 ART 治疗后实现活产的社会差异今天在阿姆斯特丹举行的 ESHRE 第 40 届年会上发表的一项新颖研究揭示了辅助生殖技术 (ART) 治疗后实现活产的巨大社会差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Study-reveals-social-disparities-in-achiving-live-births-following-ART-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Study-reveals-social-disparities-in-achieving-live-births-following-ART-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d884dcb5-4df7-496c-b015-a7736b87e7a6 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 23:21:15 -0400 Study reveals social disparities in achieving live births following ART treatment
联合使用流行的糖尿病药物可能会提供额外的预防心脏和肾脏疾病的保护新研究表明，联合使用钠葡萄糖协同转运蛋白 2 抑制剂 (SGLT2is) 和胰高血糖素样肽 1 受体激动剂 (GLP1-RA) 可能会为糖尿病患者提供额外的预防心脏和肾脏疾病的保护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Combined-use-of-popular-diabetes-drugs-likely-to-offer-additional-protection-against-heart-and-kidney-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240708/Combined-use-of-popular-diabetes-drugs-likely-to-offer-additional-protection-against-heart-and-kidney-disease.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=200ad368-397e-4c0c-a636-0125b41607c2 Mon, 08 Jul 2024 23:16:35 -0400 Combined use of popular diabetes drugs likely to offer additional protection against heart and kidney disease
